welcome_message_body: Welcome to Valle de Santiago, Mexico! Get ready to be charmed by its picturesque landscapes, vibrant culture, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Rincon Charro
restaurants.description: Rincon Charro is a steakhouse located in Valle de Santiago.
restaurants.address: Revolucion 88 + 900, Emiliano Zapata (Carr. Valle - Salamanca), 38406 Valle de Santiago, Guanajuato

restaurants.address: Siete Luminarias, Valle De Santiago, Guanajuato

restaurants.name: Lolita's Café
restaurants.description: Lolita's Café is a breakfast spot located in Valle de Santiago.
restaurants.address: Juárez S/N Portal Jardín Principal (Carranza), 38400 Valle De Santiago, Guanajuato

restaurants.name: Taquería Los Cisnes
restaurants.description: Taquería Los Cisnes is a taco restaurant located in Valle de Santiago.

restaurants.name: Restaurant El Agave Azul

restaurants.address: Carretera libre Valle-Yuriria Km 1.5, 38400 Valle de Santiago, Guanajuato

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Celaya Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
